title: Calories in Vodka Soda
meta_description: Discover calories in vodka soda, a low-cal cocktail option, with full nutrition breakdown including carbs, alcohol content, and serving tweaks for mixology.
assumptions: Standard serving: 1.5 oz (44 ml) plain vodka mixed with soda water; no added sugars, juices, or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by vodka brand, pour size, mixer quality, and additions like lime or syrup. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard vodka soda contains about 97 calories, all from the alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in vodka soda?
faqs.a: About 97 kcal for a standard 1.5 oz vodka with soda water.
Yes, 0 g carbs, making it keto-friendly without added mixers.
All 97 kcal come from vodka; plain soda water adds 0 kcal.

faqs.q: Does adding lime change calories in vodka soda?
faqs.a: Negligibleâ€”fresh lime wedge adds under 5 kcal.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in vodka soda?
faqs.a: Opt for a single shot, skip sugary add-ins, and use club soda.
